job description:
RESPONSIBILITIES:

Kforce has a client in search of a Systems Data Scientist in Houston, Texas (TX).

Duties:
A Systems Data Scientist is charged with ensuring the following Department objectives:
  • Combine and synthesize data from multiple sources, select appropriate analytical methods to explore, develop, and test hypotheses
  • Develop and apply predictive models, communicate results effectively and clearly to a range of audiences
  • Stay up to date with techniques and tools
  • Use a Systems Engineering approach for the design, realization, technical management, operations, and retirement of systems concerned within the context of the Company Technology Innovation Process
  • Maintaining compliance with established Company policies and procedures, compliance of general business practices with applicable government laws and regulations, and Integrity and security of the Company's data systems
The Systems Data Scientist will conduct the activities described below in support of the above Department objectives; Systems Data Scientist will perform activities such as:
  • Developing and managing System Level requirements following the Company's Systems Engineering Process
  • Collect, analyze, and interpret information from multiple data sources identifying actionable insights that create efficiencies and improve drilling performance and safety
  • Build predictive models and machine-learning algorithms for second-level analytics
  • Develop reports and/or presentations leveraging data visualization tools that clearly and concisely communicate analytical findings and recommendations to key stakeholders
  • Leverage analytical tools (SQL, SAS, Tableau) and data mining techniques to perform advanced data manipulation and extract insights from large databases
  • Other duties may be assigned. Identify and implement strategies to leverage valuable data sources across search, signal, RMS, GMS and other digital channels
  • Support ad hoc analytics need as requested
REQUIREMENTS:
  • Master's degree in Computer Science, Mathematics, Engineering or other relevant disciplines
  • Understanding of signal processing, databases and experience with data mining
  • Proficiency in analysis packages (e.g. R, SAS, MATLAB) and programming languages (e.g. Python, Ruby, Java, Scala) and machine learning methods
Kforce is an Equal Opportunity/Affirmative Action Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, pregnancy, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, age, protected veteran status, or disability status.
